resources.string: SwiftIntern is the India\'s largest student-focused internship portal, bringing students, employers and higher education institutions together in one centralized location. Swiftintern.com provides a wide variety of interactive tools and services to enable every student, employer and educator to better understand and optimize internship opportunities, enabling businesses to identify the best job candidates and for students to develop the real-world skills they will need upon graduation.
No college Students should graduate without any professional experience
